name: AnnotationArrayBuilder
description: A specialized builder for constructing array properties within annotation definitions.
overview:
The ClassBuilder.AnnotationBuilder.AnnotationArrayBuilder class is a specialized builder for constructing array properties within annotation definitions. This builder allows you to add elements to annotation arrays, supporting various data types including strings, primitives, enums, classes, and nested annotations.

AnnotationArrayBuilder instances are obtained through the putArray() method of AnnotationBuilder and provide a fluent API for adding array elements before finalizing the array and returning to the parent annotation builder.

methods.name: putString
methods.description: Adds a string element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The string value to add to the array

methods.name: putInt
methods.description: Adds an integer element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The integer value to add to the array

methods.name: putLong
methods.description: Adds a long element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The long value to add to the array

methods.name: putDouble
methods.description: Adds a double element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The double value to add to the array

methods.name: putFloat
methods.description: Adds a float element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The float value to add to the array

methods.name: putBoolean
methods.description: Adds a boolean element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The boolean value to add to the array

methods.name: putByte
methods.description: Adds a byte element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The byte value to add to the array

methods.name: putShort
methods.description: Adds a short element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The short value to add to the array

methods.name: putChar
methods.description: Adds a char element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The char value to add to the array (single character)

methods.name: putClass
methods.description: Adds a Class element to the annotation array.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The Class object to add to the array

methods.name: putEnum
methods.description: Adds an enum element to the annotation array.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Finalizes the array and returns to the parent AnnotationBuilder. This method must be called to apply the array to the annotation property.
